data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Balangir, Odisha, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Balangir, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Balangir, Odisha, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary: On average, 134 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Balangir, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Balangir.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,649,000 people live in the county of Balangir. Please, give them 329 new simple churches this year.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Solaha people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Solaha people.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Balangir. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, help the 18,139 believers in Balangir to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Balangir.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
